full_description:
Garmin Venu 2 Plus AMOLED Display Bluetooth Calling Waterproof Fitness Smartwatch

Garmin Venu 2 Plus Fitness Smartwatch offers the feel-good benefits of healthy living and the convenience of a GPS smartwatch that can make or take phone calls and send texts when connected to a compatible smartphone. It lets you monitor your overall health accurately. The Smartwatch comes with a 1.3" AMOLED Touchscreen Display with Corning Gorilla Glass 3. It displays all the notifications and content amazingly even under bright sunlight thanks to the crystal-clear AMOLED display. The Smartwatch comes equipped with a built-in speaker and microphone. The Garmin Venu 2 Plus features Bluetooth Calling and music with storage for up to 650 songs.

Built-in Speaker and Microphone

Garmin Venu 2 Plus has been designed with a built-in speaker and microphone. So you can enjoy phone calls by connecting your smartwatch to your Apple or Android Smartphone via Bluetooth. You can also enjoy using the voice assistant directly from your smartwatch.

Complete Picture of your Health

The Venu 2 Plus reviews your stress, heart rate, sleep, and activity level to gauge your body’s energy levels. It can monitor your stress level, sample your heart rate multiple times per second, and lets you know if it stays too high or too low when you’re resting. The fitness smartwatch can also observe your sleep score.

5 ATM Water Resistance

You can wear the Garmin Venu 2 Plus anywhere thanks to the 5 ATM Water Rating. you can swim wearing the watch on your wrist. The watch also shows you the pool swim metrics including lengths, distance, pace, stroke count, swim efficiency (swolf), calories.

Buy Garmin Venu 2 Plus Fitness Smartwatch from the best Smart Watch Shop in BD

In Bangladesh, you can get the original Garmin Venu 2 Plus AMOLED Display Bluetooth Calling Waterproof Fitness Smartwatch From Star Tech. We have a large collection of the latest Garmin Smartwatches to purchase. Order Online Or Visit your Nearest Star Tech Shop to get yours at the lowest price. The Garmin Venu 2 Plus Smartwatch comes with no warranty.

full_description:
Garmin Venu 2S AMOLED Display Waterproof Fitness Smartwatch

Garmin Venu 2S Fitness Smartwatch offers the feel-good benefits of healthy living and the convenience of a GPS. This is a smaller-sized fitness smartwatch built for the busy lifestyle, with features including animated workouts, sleep scores, and generic health monitoring. It lets you monitor your overall health accurately. The Smartwatch comes with a 1.1" AMOLED Touchscreen Display with Corning Gorilla Glass 3. It displays all the notifications and content amazingly even under bright sunlight thanks to the crystal-clear AMOLED display. The always-on mode keeps the display visible at all times.

Complete Picture of your Health

The Venu 2S reviews your stress, heart rate, sleep, and activity level to gauge your body’s energy levels. It can monitor your stress level, sample your heart rate multiple times per second, and let you know if it stays too high or too low when you’re resting. The fitness smartwatch can also observe your sleep score. Log your daily fluid intake as a reminder to stay hydrated. You can even have an auto goal for hydration that adjusts based on how much you sweat during activities. The Venu 2S can also track menstrual cycles or pregnancy.

5 ATM Water Resistance

You can wear the Garmin Venu 2S anywhere thanks to the 5 ATM Water Rating. you can swim wearing the watch on your wrist. The watch also shows you the pool swim metrics including lengths, distance, pace, stroke count, swim efficiency (swolf), and calories.

Long Battery Life with Rapid Recharging

Garmin Venu 2S runs for up to 10 days in smartwatch mode, up to 19 hours in GPS mode, and up to 7 hours in GPS mode with music, you can get an uninterrupted picture of your health. 10 minutes of charging equals one day's worth of smartwatch mode battery life or one hour's worth of GPS with music battery life.

full_description:
Garmin Instinct 2 Standard Edition Rugged GPS Smartwatch

The Garmin Instinct 2 Standard Edition is a rugged GPS smartwatch designed for demanding environments. It meets military standards for durability and offers features like night vision compatibility. With up to 14 days of battery life, multi-GNSS satellite support, and smartphone connectivity, it's a reliable companion for outdoor adventures. The Garmin Instinct 2 Standard Edition Smartwatch includes functions such as stealth mode, jumpmaster mode, and projected waypoints. It also features wrist-based heart rate monitoring, stress tracking, and built-in sports apps. With Garmin Connect and Garmin Explore apps, you can access detailed statistics, track goals, and sync and share data.

full_description:
Garmin Instinct Tactical Edition Rugged GPS Smartwatch

The Garmin Instinct Tactical Edition is a rugged GPS smartwatch designed for demanding environments. It meets military standards for durability and offers features like night vision compatibility. With up to 14 days of battery life, multi-GNSS satellite support, and smartphone connectivity, it's a reliable companion for outdoor adventures. The Garmin Instinct Tactical Edition Smartwatch includes functions such as stealth mode, jumpmaster mode, and projected waypoints. It also features wrist-based heart rate monitoring, stress tracking, and built-in sports apps. With Garmin Connect and Garmin Explore apps, you can access detailed statistics, track goals, and sync and share data.

full_description:
Garmin Instinct 2 Solar Tactical Edition Rugged GPS Smartwatch

The Garmin Instinct 2 Solar Tactical Edition is a rugged GPS smartwatch designed with tactical-specific features and solar charging capability. It is built to withstand tough conditions and provides unlimited battery life in smartwatch mode through solar charging. The Garmin Instinct 2 Solar Tactical Edition Smartwatch is equipped with night vision compatibility, making it suitable for field operations. It also offers stealth mode to ensure privacy by disabling GPS positioning and wireless connectivity. With dual-format GPS coordinates, it enhances situational awareness. The Garmin Instinct 2 Solar Tactical Edition Smartwatch adheres to military standards for toughness, being water-rated up to 100 meters and resistant to thermal and shock. It features a fiber-reinforced polymer case and scratch-resistant lens for durability. The Garmin Instinct 2 Solar Tactical Edition allows for 24/7 health monitoring, including wrist-based heart rate tracking, stress tracking, advanced sleep monitoring, and body energy monitoring. It offers multiple sports apps, HIIT workout tracking, recovery time estimation, and VO2 max measurement. Garmin Instinct 2 Solar Tactical Edition Smartwatch provides smart notifications, Garmin Pay contactless payments, safety and tracking features, and compatibility with the Garmin Connect app. The Garmin Instinct 2 Solar Tactical Edition is the ultimate smartwatch for tactical missions and outdoor adventures.

title: Garmin Lily Classic Edition Women Smartwatch
cat_seo_title: Garmin Smartwatch Price in Bangladesh | Star Tech
cat_seo_description: Buy Garmin Smartwatch at best price in Bangladesh. Latest Garmin Fitness & Health Tracking Sports Smart Watch available at Star Tech Shop. Order online for delivery in BD.
full_description:
Garmin Lily Classic Edition Women Smartwatch

The Garmin Lily Classic Edition is a Smartwatch for women. It is a small and stylish powerhouse that keeps you connected and fashionable. With a flick of your wrist, the patterned lens reveals a bright touchscreen display, offering the best of both worlds. This Garmin smartwatch boasts a sleek and small 34 mm watch case with a stylish patterned lens. Tap or twist your wrist to reveal the vibrant touchscreen display, adding a touch of elegance to your daily wear. The Garmin Lily Classic Edition is loaded with features that cater to your health and well-being. Track your body's energy levels with Body Battery energy monitoring, and stay informed about your heart rate, stress levels, and respiration throughout the day.

Women's Health Tracking

Garmin Lily Classic Edition Women Smartwatch offers some important features specialized for the ladies. Use the Garmin Connect app to track your menstrual cycle or pregnancy, log symptoms, and receive exercise and nutrition education. Keep everything at your fingertips, right on your wrist.

Stay Connected with Smart Notification

Garmin Lily offers some useful functions to stay connected on the go. Receive smart notifications, emails, texts, and alerts on your watch when paired with a compatible smartphone. Stay safe with safety and tracking features that allow you to send assistance alerts with your live location to selected contacts.

Made for People on the Move

Garmin Lily tracks your fitness progress, including steps, calories burned, and intensity minutes. Connect to your smartphone's GPS for accurate tracking during outdoor activities like walks, rides, and runs.

5 ATM Water Resistance

Garmin Lily comes with a water rating that makes it perfect for swimming, showering, or a relaxing spa day. This smartwatch is designed to be your constant companion. Its small, lightweight design ensures comfort and style all day long.

Buy Garmin Lily Classic Edition Women Smartwatch from Star Tech

In Bangladesh, you can get the original Garmin Lily Classic Edition Women Smartwatch From Star Tech. We have a large collection of the latest Garmin Smartwatches to purchase. Order Online Or Visit your Nearest Star Tech Shop to get yours at the lowest price. The Garmin Lily Classic Edition Women Smartwatch comes with no warranty.

values.value: Up to 5 days (excluding Pulse Ox sleep tracking)
Garmin Elevate Wrist Heart Rate Monitor
Dark Bronze Bezel with Paloma Case (010-02384-B0)
